message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that I'll be losing money at a faster rate.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than you offered, but I need to make sure I get a fair share as well. This offer takes into account the inflation we're both facing.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. My offer is decreasing, but it's still the best deal you'll get considering the inflation. Think carefully.
